Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for”
Reviews.Author: Jane H
Reviews.Content: Ms. Jeannine was the best thing about this hotel. Loud drunk guests every night... Night staff tried to do their best to keep down the noise. Room was musty and had baby roaches. Not a great place for families do to all of the drunk loud partiers.

Reviews.Title: “Great experience!*”
Reviews.Author: Lbender92
Reviews.Content: Jeanie was very welcoming and made us feel great about staying at her hotel. She let us know about free family fun for the week at ocean city and the rooms were clean and cute. My favorite thing other than the service and location were the beds, they were so comfortable I couldn't believe it. This bed was more comfortable than my bed at home and definitelty more comfortable than any other hotel I'd ever stayed at. A+

Reviews.Title: “Nice place, good location, fair rates and nice size rooms.”
Reviews.Author: saharasux
Reviews.Content: This was my first time staying at the Executive and it was a last minute booking. I stayed here for Labor day weekend (friday-monday) and the rates where pretty decent about $430.00. It was the cheapest for Labor day weekend and with it being a last minute trip. Nice size rooms, with 2 double beds, microwave, small frig. tv, table and 2 chairs to eat by and dresser. Nice bathroom with hair dryer and ofcourse sink, toilet and shower. The rooms where very clean and also have air conditioners which i forgot to mention. It was a good location about a block from the beach and about 5 blocks or so from where the boardwalk starts. I booked the room off the internet and unfortunately the worse thing was the room we got (room 308) really didn't have a view of anything because the building is shaped like and L. Our room happened to be in the corner which doesn't change the feelings I have about the place. I do plan on staying here again I am very pleased with the time I stayed there. Will plan to stay here again in the future!!

Reviews.Title: “We love miss jenne!”
Reviews.Author: CEH531
Reviews.Content: We've been coming to the executive motel for about 4 summers now. The location is awesome and so close to the beach. The most affordable place we have found down there. Miss Jenne couldn't be sweeter we just wish she would go back to night shift :) see you memorial day jenne!! Xoxo, your philly wine girls

Reviews.Title: “AWESOME MOTEL”
Reviews.Author: L0l_223
Reviews.Content: On Thursday 08/23/12 our family arrived to OC, the day was cloudy and sprinkling but then the day turned out to be beautiful and sunny. When it was time for check in the process went smoothly and we opened our room door. To my surprise the room was cool and pleasant!! this was very welcoming due to the extreme heat outside it was AWESOME!!! The beds were so comfortable and I slept like a queen!! THANK YOU EXECUTIVE MOTEL, WE WILL BE BACK!! Lolita PS: If you are visiting the Executive Motel and get hungry, eat at the Sahara Cafe they have the best sausages for breakfast!!

Reviews.Title: “Not enough nice things to say!!”
Reviews.Author: LadyVNJ
Reviews.Content: Miss Jeanie is such a sweetheart! From the moment I called to reserve a room to check in, until check out she was so pleasant and attentive to all our needs. She is great at recommending good eats and fun activities. rooms were VERY CLEAN! Sarah from maid service did an excellent job everyday. Beds were comfy. Bathrooms were clean with lots of towels and great water pressure in the shower. AC/ microwave/fridge all worked nicely. One block from a quieter part of the beach and just a few blocks away from the quieter end of the board walk. My 9 year old loved the small yet clean pool! No loud parties either! Mostly families. The jolly roger amusement park is just steps away... Big plus for families! Many food establishments in walking distance nearby. All in all, if you want a huge bang for your buck, stay at the EXECUTIVE MOTEL! We'll definitely be back next summer! This motel can't be beat! Best, Miss Jeanie's Periwinkle Girl;)

Reviews.Title: “Extremely Pleased”
Reviews.Author: Mary H
Reviews.Content: After reading all of the reviews about the Executive, I decided to reserve two rooms. My only concern was about the all night "partying" reviews, but took the chance. Upon driving up, my boyfriend was quite concerned, let out a sigh and said "it is what it is." I was very pleased with not only the economical pricing of the Executive, but thoroughly pleased with the staff and the cleanliness. I am also happy to report there were no all night parties ongoing during my visit, much to the dismay of my daughters. Sleeping was incredible. I felt right at home and woke every morning rested with no back ache's. I have to say, Ms. Jeanne sold me as soon as we walked through the door of the lobby. Just meeting such a fantastic soul made our experience worth while. The rooms are clean and the bathroom reminded me of an old school bathroom...like when I was a child, but it too was clean and the shower was awesome. Plenty of hot water and pressure. There was no mold, nor musty smell, which I expected giving the age of the place. I have been traveling to Ocean City for the past 40 years and would often drive right past the Executive. I am so very pleased that I took that chance. I most definitely WILL be returning in the future. Ms. Jeanne you are truly amazing and your giving credit to the dedication and pride of the maid staff and the owners was uplifting. That place would not be the same without you and the trememously staff. By the way, happy to report... by the end of the weekend, my boyfriend told me that I did a wonderful job selecting this place and that he was sorry for doubting me. I thank you Executive for a life changing experience. Never judge a book by it's cover.

Reviews.Title: “Had a nice visit!”
Reviews.Author: ReeseLR
Reviews.Content: Overall, this place was pretty nice - very clean and very friendly staff. It was great having a balcony with 2 chairs since the rooms were nonsmoking and to enjoy the weather. Guests of this hotel are in walking distance to a part of the beach that isn't too crowded too. I would stay at this place again!

Reviews.Title: “Great service!”
Reviews.Author: Alyssa R
Reviews.Content: I have been staying at the Executive Motel for over 6 years. We were just there again last week for three nights for my future sister-in-laws bachelorette party and it was reconfirmed why I always choose this motel. The service from Miss Jeanie and John are phenomenal and we couldn't have asked for a better stay! They are always accommodating and willing to help. The rooms are always clean and affordable. Thank you again for a great stay.

Reviews.Title: “Love OCMD, Love Executive!”
Reviews.Author: Heather O
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Executive last summer for the first time, it was suggested by a coworker. We loved it! It is about a block from the beach and close to the boardwalk. We could see the ocean from our room! The people in the office are so nice and helpful! They suggested numerous places to eat and things to do. The room was sparkling clean and nice. Nothing fancy, but to us that doesnt matter because we arent in the room much anyway. As long as its clean, the AC works, and it doesnt smell, I'm fine with it! It is a good price compared to some places in OCMD. We are heading back next week and I cannot wait! Definitely would recommend this place to everyone I know!

Reviews.Title: “Economical”
Reviews.Author: xohotmamma
Reviews.Content: Passing through Ocean City and stopped to see some friends! So, wanted something fairly priced for one night! The rooms were outdated, but clean! The pool was small, but clean as well and served its purpose! Because it was a motel, you couldn't really open your curtains in the room because passers by could look right in! We did have some issues; such as lights not working, the air conditioner didn't seem to cool the room down enough and the refrigerator wasn't plugged in so we had to wait to get it cool enough to hold our beverages! All in all it was a nice motel for its price point and the staff was friendly! I will definitely consider for a future stay!

Reviews.Title: “I will definitely be a return customer!”
Reviews.Author: KayJay86
Reviews.Content: My girlfriend and I recently stayed at the Executive Motel and were VERY pleased with our stay. I think most people would agree, staying at a new hotel when you go on any vacation is a little nerve-wrecking. You can take the virtual tours, read the reviews online, but those don't always add up. Before we even arrived, we called ahead to ask if we could at least get our parking pass even though it was hours before check-in time. The response we got, I could hear the enthusiasm in the womans voice and I wasn't even the one making the call. As soon as we walked in the door, we got a very warm welcome from the lady behind the desk. (I'm sorry I don't remember her name!). She was very nice, very happy. The room we stayed in was better than what we were expecting. Very spacious, very clean, the beds were super comfortable. The only 2 things that we would have to "complain" about would be the pool which was very small, however the beach was literally right across the street so it evened out. And the parking was a little hectic, but even then the management was very helpful in helping us find a spot when the lot was full. I can't speak for my friend, but I'm almost positive that she would agree that we will for sure be returning customers! As a matter of fact I am planning another trip in September and the Executive is my first choice. Thank you so much for making our weekend getaway well worth it!

Reviews.Title: “We love the executive!”
Reviews.Author: Devon E
Reviews.Content: My friend and I stayed at this wonderful motel for senior beach week. Let me just say that it was amazing! Also, Miss Jeanie was definitely the coolest person we met during our entire week in Ocean City. The only thing we didn't like is that we had to pay for the ice machine. I have never been to a motel or hotel where you had to pay for the ice. It cost .25 to fill the tiny bucket they provide in the room. Which would probably cost $7 to fill our cooler, so we took a bus downtown and bought a big bag for much cheaper. Also we had an issue with our upstairs neighbors (a group of senior boys partying like crazy) sounding like a herd of elephants, but once we mentioned it to the front desk the issue was immediately taken care of. We absolutely loved our stay and it was for a great price! Coming from Fort Whaley campground where our stay was miserable, full of cockroaches and mosquitoes, thunderstorms, and poor front desk service, once arriving at the Executive on the spot we immediately felt the hospitality and warm greetings from Miss Jeanie. We will definitely be booking our reservations here again next time we come back! Also, Vanessa our housekeeper was fantastic as well.

Reviews.Title: “My experience with Executive Motel”
Reviews.Author: Pete M
Reviews.Content: Loved It! Perfect location, clean comfortable rooms,great staff, all 3 shifts! Thanks go out to Miss Jeanie, John, Rob, and Vern. And to our wonderfull housekeeper who understood perfectly not to wake the kids early and had all our anemities covered everyday. Had 2 adjoining rooms on the top floor and could see the ocean. I work for the hotel industry and this place was right for me and my family. Pete M Col, Ohio

Reviews.Title: “A fan for eight years and counting!”
Reviews.Author: Melissa R
Reviews.Content: My family and I have been coming to the executive motel for eight years now. We found it by accident after wanting to extend our stay in OC after staying at a very expensive hotel. We absolutely love this motel and can't say enough good things about it. We come every year for the first two weeks in July. First of all you can't beat the price, for being right across the street from the beach and walking distance to the boardwalk you will not find a better priced motel. Secondly the rooms are super clean and very spacious. Each room has a small fridge and microwave which is convenient for when you Bing your own food and drinks. The staff is exceptionally friendly and very knowledgeable about the surrounding area. Can't say enough about the manager Ms Jeannie she is so sweet and treats everyone like family. If I had to say one thing negative about the executive it would be that the wifi is slow, but I guess being on vacation and having limited access to the internet is not a terrible thing. Overall I highly recommend this place to everyone and will continue to come here for many more years!

Reviews.Title: “Better than you think”
Reviews.Author: puckettg
Reviews.Content: No this is not the Hilton but if your a budget traveler this can't be beat. Nice sized rooms very clean and super close to the beach. Actually closer then some oceanfront places down on the south side due to beach being shorter here. Less then three blocks from boardwalk. Jeannie the manager is full of local knowledge and couldn't be nicer. Water and small amusement park right behind motel. We have budget traveled for years and I can honestly say this is a great value!!

Reviews.Title: “Great room for the price”
Reviews.Author: Dspike572001
Reviews.Content: I stayed here back in Late May 2011 with 3 friends. The room was bigger than expected. Staff very friendly, always checking up on use. Location very close to the beach and walking distance from the boardwalk. Very please with the price and would love to stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Nothing special, but great for the $$”
Reviews.Author: tinacaro
Reviews.Content: We stayed here on a last minute trip to OC MD. I am a little sketchy when it comes to beach motels, but I was pleasantly surprised. This motel is way less expensive than most places at the shore. We were able to get a parking pass and check in early, so when 2pm hit, we just grabbed our key and did not have to do paperwork. It has a small pool. There is free parking, but limited to 1 car only and the parking lot is very tight. They also have free wifi, but the connection was poor. It is a block from the beach, crossing Baltimore St. It is three blocks north of the boardwalk (where you can pick up a $3 each way per person tram) so this was very convenient. There is an amusement park also a block away and a lot of small bars and restaurants close by. Other travelers wrote this place was very loud, so we took a room on the 3rd floor (it is a walkup, no elevator). We did not hear a thing at night. The beds were definitely the worst part. Our room had 2 double beds that were very old and caved in on the center. I suggest bringing extra blankets and sheets. The room was clean and well made up with a small fridge but no coffee maker. There were more tv channels than I have at home!! All in all, a good place. Would likely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Inexpensive, no frills, block from beach”
Reviews.Author: MonikaFabianska
Reviews.Content: Oc,MD hotels can be very expensive for the "old" quality it provides. Love Oc,MD but I think they overprice the hotels. My husband and I stayed in Executive Motel for 3 days in July and its perfect location (block from the beach) few blocks from fun places like Secrets. My husband and I dont stay in the hotel room much but to shower and sleep so we spend least on the hotel and most on going out and activities. If you want a clean room, friendly service, great location, and youre not high maintnence, this is the place for you.

Reviews.Title: “Lots to praise about”
Reviews.Author: gracemore7
Reviews.Content: We wanted to spend a couple of days at the beach and not spend a lot on the room but wanted a clean and decent place. The Executive Motel was absolutely perfect! The rate is very inexpensive and the location is great. The rooms are clean and spacious with 2 double beds, a large sized fridge and a microwave. The A/C was really kicking and it would get so cold in the room that we often had to turn the temp down. The water pressure was the strongest that I have ever had. The internet service was excellent- you just ask them for the code to connect to their wi-fi. The walls and the doors are very thick and almost sound proof. Saw mostly families staying there and most of them seemed to know the manager Jeannie very well and appeared to be yearly guests. Jeannie is the sweetest and most helpful person - you can tell she genuinely cares about every person who checks in and wants you to enjoy and have a pleasant stay. Daily maid service was a plus. I would highly recommend if you are looking for a clean and simple room to stay in with all working appliances and the basic things you need to comfortably enjoy a few days at the beach :) Great job Executive Motel- keep up the good work in maintaining your rooms!

Reviews.Title: “Motel was clean and nice for the price.”
Reviews.Author: Sboop
Reviews.Content: Motel was clean, staff was friendly and helpful. LocatEd just blocks from the boardwalk and one block from the beach. Great price! Would definitely stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Poor management”
Reviews.Author: okelly2
Reviews.Content: Stayed here last year and had a very good experience. This year eas a desaster since the first night there was a fightb that left a room trashed and blood splattered cars. The next night you have ten people partying loudly till five in the morning. Asked the front desk and was told the have a sleep in and this is how this hotel has been. If you have kids like me this is not the hotel for you. We liked the location since it is right across the street from Jolly Rogers and on thirteeth street but is not condictive for a family vaction

Reviews.Title: “Clean and affordable”
Reviews.Author: kjill99
Reviews.Content: The Executive Motel is on 30th Street on Coastal Highway in Ocean City, Maryland. The rooms are clean and well maintained. There's nothing peeling or cracking. Three floors and no elevator. Ample parking. Bathrooms are sparkling and the shower is like a jet of water hitting you. Always hot water. Standard double bed room with a table and chairs. Roomy if you have kids. Close to all attractions. 2 blocks from the boardwalk and one block walk from the beach itself. Staff is friendly, maid service is excellent. Miss Jeannie is a wealth of knowledge and is a staple at the place.

Reviews.Title: “Loved it. Great for Price!”
Reviews.Author: 23lmk
Reviews.Content: A group of my friends (early/mid20s) stayed here for a two nights in July. After looking at a lot of different hotels, I decided on booking this one. We were not disappointed at all. The room has the basics and was very clean; front desk staff were extremely friendly and welcoming. Since we were only allowed 1 parking spot per room, my friend got the spot in the lot, and I surprisingly found street parking right next to the hotel. We did not use the pool, but noticed it was being used well by all ages. This motel is in an excellent location, and it's great that it's a very short walk to the beach. It appears to be a very family friendly hotel. Overall, we had a great stay, great value for our money, and we will definitely be staying here again in the future!

Reviews.Title: “clean and well managed”
Reviews.Author: Mikh60
Reviews.Content: We just spent several days here for 1st time. The motel was very clean, quiet, very well managed. the cleaning staff was friendly and did a good job. was close to the beach. after several years of different motels and bad experiences at all, this was a welcome change. we will be back in August and September for sure. Mike Hale

Reviews.Title: “Awesome staff, great value & location...”
Reviews.Author: SuzySilva
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend and I were looking for a decent hotel/motel that wasn't too expensive. We were going to Ocean City for a few days and i found this place online. The price was great! for 4 nights, we paid $396. We reserved out room online, and the following day I called to confirm the reservation and they had recieved everything. When we checked in, we were greeted by Mrs. Jeanie... she was amazing! So sweet and so helpful. She was a complete doll, from the minute we walked in. She pointed us in the direction of great restuarants and great sightseeing locations. The room is pretty basic with 2 double beds, a refrig & microwave, tv and a table with 2 chairs. It's not the most modern room, but its very clean and presentable. The room service was great as well. My boyfriend and I would never get out of the room before the room service came around, so when they would get to our room, we would just ask for fresh towels. Even if we gave them back 2 or 3, we would still get a whole new set of fresh, cleaned towels. The pool is smaller then most hotels, but its still big enough. Any time we would go to the pool, there would barely be anyone there anyway. The motel is located a block from the beach and about 2-3 blocks from the end of the boardwalk. All in all, we had a great time and this motel definitely fit our needs. We would definitely go back and stay at the Executive Motel.

Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for”
Reviews.Author: tristanasha
Reviews.Content: This hotel was clean, however, that is the only good thing about it. It is very old school and not a place to take a family with young children. The location was pretty great, but the beds are very hard and there were flies all over the place. Save up your money and pay the extra to get the amenities you need for young children and comfortability. I would not go back to his hotel. The pool was small, but very nice. You had to pay for ice and the internet connection was HORRIBLE. They only have one ironing board and one iron that you have to wait for and return when you're done. I was not satisfied at all in this place.

Reviews.Title: “Nice room for the money”
Reviews.Author: joshnrayasmom
Reviews.Content: Me and my family just returned from our stay in Ocean City. I'd like to say that staying at the Executive Motel worked out well for us. The price was nice and the location is close to the beach. The rooms were clean and the staff was very friendly . I plan on using this motel next year when we go back.

Reviews.Title: “clean and close”
Reviews.Author: momma14
Reviews.Content: very clean room,pool was well maintaned,service was good,and it was a great location from the beach. We had a good time for the price,we would stay there again...

Reviews.Title: “good value”
Reviews.Author: luv2travel_letsgo
Reviews.Content: Walking distance to beach, without having to cross the dangerous Coastal Hwy. Rooms were very clean, decor left much to be desired. Staff was friendly Pool is smaller than it looks in the picture. While it was a decent stay, the clientele is still of the'OC variety', so if you don't like people sitting out on the balcony and drinking/smoking until the wee hours, go up to Rehobeth.

Reviews.Title: “Decent”
Reviews.Author: jennir70
Reviews.Content: I searched for days on reviews of all kinds of hotels and motels for decent price and this was the best. When i talked to the receptionist she said they had just won the BBB 2010 award. It has a nice location a block away from the beach, good parking, it is a few blocks from the boardwalk which is good and bad, mostly quiet, some HS and college kids still partying. i liked that the agreement you sign on check in state no loud music, underage drinking etc, give a sense of safety. pool was small but nice and clean. i was very shocked when on our second day we arrived and the room was not cleaned. i called the front desk and they said the maid had left, they then threw at me towels and sheet plus the vaccuum. yes I myself had to vaccuum and the darn thing didn't even work!! when i went in the next dayto the front desk i asked for a number or email to contact the owner, the guy across the desk couldn't get me anything and said that i was supposed to put the sign on the door to have the room cleaned, which is foolish, i have never heard of that. I was told that the manager/owner would call but i never heard from anyone. i don't know what happaned, i would like an explanation and a discount, but overall i can't say this wasn't a bad place to stay for a last minute long weekend no frills place.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay!”
Reviews.Author: nikkielynn07
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend and I stayed at this motel from May 30th to June 3rd. After reading the reviews on here about almost every motel in OC, we booked this motel, unsure of what it would be like. We definitely were surprised. It's located on 30th street and Baltimore avenue. It's in a great location because its 2 streets away from the boardwalk, so it was easy to walk over there and back. The motel is older so the building doesn't look too nice from the outside, but it has three floors, and no elevator, so it sucked carrying all of our things up the steps. The room and pool were small, but were exactly what was described and shown on the virtual tour on its website. They gave us the room that they showed on the virtual tour, room 317, which is right on the end on the third floor. From its location, it had a good view of the ocean from behind the Flamingo motel, which made us feel closer to the beach. If you stay here, definitely try to get room 317 or 316, because you'll have the best view. Check in was at 2, but we arrived at 1 and they had our room all ready. The parking lot in the front of the motel was full so we had to park in the back, which made us nervous because we couldn't see the car from our room. However, the parking lot quickly cleared out and we moved the car. The staff were extremely friendly. The lady at the front desk that checked us in was very nice, as well as the owner. Every time she saw us she made sure we were enjoying our trip and asked us how we liked the room. The maids were very nice and they kept our room clean. There was no mold or anything nasty in the room. It did have the musty sea smell, but other than that it was very clean. The only real complaints I had were that there was a little window in the room straight across from the door, that had no curtain or blind. The sun was very bright coming through it in the morning and at night you could see the bright lights coming in from Coastal Highway. Also, there was no counter space in the bathroom. Other than that everything else was great. Since our trip was during an offseason time, the room rate was very cheap, and after the first day, there were hardly any other people staying at the motel, so it was nice and quiet all week. it was nice because you couldn't hear any sounds coming from outside in the room. The room was great for what we used it for, we didn't spend a huge amount of time in it, but sat on the balcony a lot, which was very nice. I definitely recommend this place if you are looking for a cheap motel that is clean with a friendly staff!

Reviews.Title: “Better Than Expected”
Reviews.Author: Jsoc
Reviews.Content: It is what it is...if you're looking for a budget hotel, close to the beach, this place is fine. If you're looking to spend much more money, be on the beach, closer to the "happening" end of the boardwalk, a nice big pool, hotel restaurant and spend more money, stay someplace else. The room was clean. No wierd odors or anything else. The front desk woman, was very nice and helpful. Very accomodating for extra towels and stuff. You park right in front of your room, and walk to the beach in less than a minute. It's a 5 block walk to the boardwalk. There is a tram that will take you to the other end of the boardawalk, where there's much more going on. The have a pool. It is very small, but it was very clean. It was right across from Jolly Roger amusement park, and many restaurants.

Reviews.Title: “I really loved this Motel- very nice and close to the beach”
Reviews.Author: beachgrle1
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the executive motel Summer of 2008 ( July). The front desk workers were polite and nice when I was checking in, We stayed on the 3rd floor and the 3rd floor view is nice you can see the ocean and the view of ocean city. the motel pool is very nice and very cleaned and we didnt have a problem finding a parking spot- july is the most bussiest time in OC but the executive was nice and quiet not crowded or noisey. its located on 30th street block back from beach acrose from flamingo motel. and right acrose from Jolly rogers. the rooms were clean and nice a basic clean motel for oc and the value for your money is really really good, nice bath room and beds no meldew or tiles in the celing missing and no nasty smell in the room. Very pleseant exp

Reviews.Title: “clean motel with great service!”
Reviews.Author: oscarcolumbia
Reviews.Content: What a breath of fresh air! We had a wonderful time at the Executive Motel. We were on a budget so we chose the Executive knowing full well that it was a dated motel. However, we were so pleasantly surprised by the cleanliness and friendliness and service we received. We were immediately given a parking pass at 9am. When we checked in later in the day we were greeted by a lovely woman who managed the property. She told us where everything was and gave us lots of information to make our stay enjoyable. Very friendly! When it was bedtime, I went to the front desk and asked for blankets. I was asked how many I would like and she promptly brought us four blankets to our room. All the rooms are non-smoking and extremely clean!!!! even though they are dated. They have comfortable pillows (huge plus) and comfortable mattresses. Pool, hair dryer, good maintenance on the property, and outdoor pool that was clean. We felt very safe and enjoyed our stay very much!

HotelInfo.Name: Executive Motel
HotelInfo.Address: 30th Street & Baltimore Avenue, Ocean City, MD 21843
